time

public float time()
Description copied from interface: Clock
Returns the current time, adjusted for the latest paint's alpha.

Specified by:
time in interface Clock

dt

public float dt()
Description copied from interface: Clock
Returns the ms between the current alpha-adjusted paint time (aka Clock.time()) and the last alpha-adjusted paint time. Some animation APIs really just want to know how many ms have elapsed since they last did their interpolation, and this saves them the trouble of having to track it themselves.

Specified by:
dt in interface Clock

alpha

public float alpha()
Description copied from interface: Clock
Returns the current paint call's alpha.

Specified by:
